judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Horace Churchman, with him Drinker, Biddle é Heath, for appellants.

casebody.head_matter:
Cox Estate.
Argued April 18, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
reargument refused July 29, 1972.
